author: scheu
msg: Corrected the doc/lit wrapped minimal marshaller.  Now it marshals and unmarshals correctly named elements. Misc comment cleanup. More to come.

author: ate
msg: Fix for JS2-605: Query string parameters should not (by default) be provided to portlets to be compliant to JSR 168 spec requirements
WARNING: this fix changes the "old" behavior of providing portal parameter to all portlets!!!
For "restoring" the old behavior, define the following in jetspeed.properties:
